name: Click With Clive!
description:
"Click with Clive" is an exciting new dice game based on "Click", a dice throwing game from 1965. 

This game is for up to 4 players, but if you have no friends to play with, then Sir Clive himself will give you a game!

If you purchase this game for $1 then you will have access to further updates, including the Next version I'm working on. I cannot say enough how much I appreciate your support. This game has taken many weeks of late nights to develop, I really focused on player experience. Let me know what you think :)

Keys

  • Pressing 1-5 allows you to keep any of the dice you have rolled. 
  • Each round you get 2 re-rolls by pressing space
  • At any point you can press S to score you current hand.
  • During scoring Q and A move through the score options and space applies your score.
  • Press H for help
